iiv.io

Class SleepBufferedReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • java.io.BufferedReader
        • iiv.io.SleepBufferedReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SleepReader, Closeable, AutoCloseable, Readable

    public class SleepBufferedReader
extends BufferedReader
implements SleepReader
    Class extends BufferedReader avoiding blocking by sleeping until ready.
    Since:
    iiV1.1
    See Also:
    CNUViewer
